bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yi jing 遺精 , involuntary loss of essence/semen. Pu ji fang 普濟方 33: 四 妙丹，治元氣久虛及小腸腎余，膀胱疝氣，五淋白濁，精滑精漏 , “The elixir with the four miraculous [ingredients]. It cures long-term depletion of original qi and surplus in the small intestine and kidneys, elevation-illness qi in the bladder, as well as the five types of dripping with white turbidity, smooth flow of essence/semen, and essence/semen leakage ”.
